column5: Sugarpacket and I took our nephew Isaiah out fishing this afternoon in hopes of some big carp. Unfortunately Isaiah by pure chance never had any takers good enough to set the hook into. Sugarpacket and I each got into a fish. The one time Isaiah's rod doubled over he was far too distracted by the snails he picked to play with. lol  Either way, we all had fun. Isaiah really loves to fish and didn't really mind at all not catching any.  And yes, those are flowers in our hair. LOL Kids make ya do the strangest things. The flowers were "good luck"
Nothing beats a day out with the little ones  P.S  : I like the flowers in your hair Rich

Sugarpacket, the scale on your fish is really interesting, you can really see the difference when you look at yours and then look at rich's.  Rich, the last shot looks like you've got flowers growing out of your head. LOL
great pics of some family fun...  It also looks like dad has lost a lot of weight ?
Great report guys. Pink is more your colour Rich, the yellow clashes with your eyes.
Alls I know is...Sugarpacket's got PIPES!  You best not step outta line, Rich

Even though your nephew didn't hook into any fish himself, I'll bet he was excited to see you guys landing 'em!  That looks like a great time you guys had, and I'll bet Asaiah knows he has a pretty cool Aunt and Uncle!
Great report and pics Rich Good on you guys for taking him out!!!  His smile says it all. Thanks for sharing Leechman
